__TOC__

This is a test results page.<<BR>>
All test must be completed by a minimum of 2 people, 1 of which must have a hardware device.  This is due to results being different between VM and hardware at times.

The link to the test is the '''Application Name'''.<<BR>>
The '''Bug''' column is for any bugs (links can be setup by using the following https://Link/to/bug123456 Bug123456 and placing them in [ ]).<<BR>>
The '''Notes''' column is for anything else.<<BR>>
The nicks of 2 different tester must be the '''Tester 1''' and '''Confirmed 2''' columns.<<BR>>
The '''Pass/Fail''' Should have 2 pass or fails in for simple confirmation.
